name: 100 Blocks - 1010 Puzzle Games
description:
Fun, simple, relaxing - join millions of players currently enjoying 100 Blocks! There is no time limit so you can enjoy this casual puzzler at your own pace and have hours of mind-bending fun.

Inspired by tetris but without any time limits . Easy to learn but difficult to master!

- Drag and drop the random blocks into the 10x10 board.
- Clear blocks by making a line of full bricks either horizontally or vertically.
- This puzzle game ends when you run out of space and can't put any more blocks down onto the board.

Download 100 blocks today for free!
